question: A restaurant has placed an advertisement for a manager in the local newspaper.Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:explain what you are currently doingdescribe your suitability for this jobTell them  when you are free to attend an interview
text: I am writing this letter to apply for a managerial position in the restaurant. I came to know through an advertisement in the newspaper. I feel that I am fit for this position.

Mohammed Idris, post-graduation in Hotel management, currently I am handling an outlet in one of the hotel chain brands, it has a presence in 15 countries. My responsibilities are managing clients, events and the kitchen in the restaurant. My team size is 45 staff who report to me. I have aligned all the tasks as per their designation to smooth the functioning of the hotel. As I am handling many tasks in the restaurant in my current, I believe I will not be facing any more difficulties in this inn as well.
I want to take exposed to your organization and wants to enhance my skills. I am available to attend the interview that is on 28th Feb'2022, Sunday, between  5pm-6pm.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
